Malawi 2019

Sadly, due to insufficient expressions of interest from potential leaders, we have had to cancel the planned expedition to Malawi in 2019. Thanks to all those who have expressed an interest and to all those who have been involved in the preparation.

Graham Little (Interim Chair of Borders Exploration Group)

Borders Exploration Group

  • Contact
  • Privacy & Cookies

    Borders Exploration Group is a volunteer-run charity run based in the Scottish Borders. Started in 1991, BEG runs annual international youth expeditions.
